metadata.title: Urban Edge Boys’ Sweatpants – 4 Pack Basic Active Fleece Joggers (Size: 5-12)
features: HIGH QUALITY: These boys' joggers are made of super comfortable and breathable fleece fabric that will keep him comfy when playing sports on chilly mornings; Suitable also as a casual and everyday outfit while relaxing at home and running errands

VERSATILE: Surprise your son with a functional multipack, perfect for a number of occasions; Whether he’s playing basketball, biking, jogging, working out or spending the day indoors watching cartoons, playing in his room, or getting ready for bed, he’ll always be comfortable in these boys’ joggers

GREAT VALUE: Get your boy a fun and stylish sweatpants multipack, featuring two pairs of joggers topped with an elastic waistband that adapts for in-between sizes and won't restrict his movement while having fun at school, playground, track or gym; Perfect gift idea for sons, brothers, nephews, grandsons

BOYS' SWEATPANTS BUNDLE: With this jogger multipack for boys, your son gets four pairs of super soft and warm fleece sweatpants; Each multipack comes in a variety of fun colors stamped with the official Urban Edge logo that stands for superb comfort and remarkable performance
EASY CARE: Machine Wash, Tumble Dry; Please Reference the Product Description below for More Details
description: Urban Edge Boys’ Fleece Jogger Pants are perfect for active boys. The supple waist stays put and won’t interfere with movement during practice or play. The cuffs have a clean look and hold in the warmth for a comfy workout. Durable fabric and stitching will survive all of his adventures and look great, wash after wash. Comfortable Fleece for recreational and casual wear. Lightweight with just the right amount of stretch. Suitable for the classroom or playing field. Classic jogger style sweatpants provide a snug fit. The elastic waistband and cuffed legs will stay in place even during heavy physical activity. Versatile bottoms go together with tees, jackets, or hoodies to help extend his sports and leisurewear wardrobe. Performance gym clothes with flexible fabric will keep your son cool and dry all day long. He’ll look and achieve his best no matter what the occasion. Easy to Clean - Simple to machine wash and dry; Please Reference the Variations for all Available Sizes and Colors. Urban Edge Offers Premium Clothing at Affordable Prices because we value every customer that visits our listings! Stop by Our Storefront to See the Rest of Our Great Deals; we’re confident you’re going to find items that anyone who needs a gift will absolutely love and adore!
